name.pehl.piriti.rebind.propertyhandler
Class AbstractPropertyHandler

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.piriti.rebind.LogFacade
      name.pehl.piriti.rebind.propertyhandler.AbstractPropertyHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractJsonPropertyHandler, AbstractXmlPropertyHandler
public abstract class AbstractPropertyHandler
extends LogFacade
implements PropertyHandler

Abstract base class for PropertyHandlers with default implementations and common code.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 140 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

Generates the variable declaration of PropertyContext#getValueVariable(). The variable is used in the remaining methods. The type of the variable will be propertyContext.getType().getParameterizedQualifiedSourceName()

readInput

public void readInput(IndentedWriter writer,
                      PropertyContext propertyContext,
                      PropertyHandlerLookup propertyHandlerLookup)
               throws UnableToCompleteException
If the native flag is set, readInputNatively(IndentedWriter, PropertyContext) is called. Otherwise if a reader was registered readInputUsingReader(IndentedWriter, PropertyContext) is called. If no reader was found, the input is read as string by calling readInputAsString(IndentedWriter, PropertyContext) and optionally converted by calling useConverterForReading(IndentedWriter, PropertyContext). If the input cannot be read as string readInputDirectly(IndentedWriter, PropertyContext) is called.

Specified by:
readInput in interface PropertyHandler
Parameters:
writer -
propertyContext -
propertyHandlerLookup -
Throws:
UnableToCompleteException
See Also:

assign

public void assign(IndentedWriter writer,
                   PropertyContext propertyContext)
            throws UnableToCompleteException
Generates the assignment of PropertyContext#getValueVariable() to the property. The assignment should only be done when the PropertyContext#getValueVariable() != null.

The assignement is only done if PropertyContext#getValueVariable() is not null.

writeValue

public void writeValue(IndentedWriter writer,
                       PropertyContext propertyContext,
                       PropertyHandlerLookup propertyHandlerLookup)
                throws UnableToCompleteException
If conversion is supported a custom or registered converter is used to convert the property to string.

If conversion is not supported String#valueOf(Object)) is used.
